title: Why did you release broken buggy software (android 11) to my phone?!
content: Was forced to download the buggy mess that is Android 11 with an infuriating multitasking bug that has been seemless on 6 years of Android because I use it at all my jobs decides to get a monkey wrench thrown in it now. And hasn't been fixed for over 3 months now. The device or app itself will glitch to high heaven and stops me dead in my tracks when I'm trying to use maps for work or just watch YouTube. Get it together google. how was this an oversight?
